Despite the games state, the game is fun and gets major new content every 2-3 months. Worth every hour

The game is a lot more complex than the surface value and premise might give off. The level of depth is actually really cool, and it's easy to get sucked in to match making once you get the hang of it. 

That being said, my friends and I hit a wall at rank 4. After that, we got matched with  GODS who would kill us instantly, so it stopped being fun at that point. 

Ranks reset every month, so other than getting to a rank you can't get past because only the gods of DBD reside there, I love this game!
Gioco divertente da giocare con gli amici, a parte qualche bug.
playing killer in 2022? you must be a masochist.

DEAD BY DEADLIGHT es el claro ejemplo de que no necesita renovarse si algo funciona perfectamente, es una experiencia frenetica y de alta tension a la hora de jugar en solo, ya sea de asesino o survivor, la experiencia cambia completamente si estas con amigos. Las mecanicas estan muy bien implementadas y constantemente reciben actualizaciones  de contenido y optimizacion, en lo personal es uno de los mejores en el  genero (vaya que es un genero muy inusual hoy en dia) a
Its hard game but once you start getting better you will like this game + its better to play with someone

Great game to test your mettle! Fun to play with friends and always an interesting time mixing and matching perks on both killers and survivors. You'll always have your ass-hat players but overall an excellent way to waste your time

As a "main survivor" player I think that Dead by Daylight is a fun horror game where you and your friends can have tons of fun while escaping or dying to the hands of the killer.
It's noteworthy that the game has balance issues, because the survivors almost completely control the flow of the game by repairing generators that spawned in unsafe areas or by leaving safe generators for the late game. The killer has ways to try and prevent survivors from doing so however, it's still a 4 vs 1 at the start of the game.
In conclusion I recommend Dead by Daylight because it's a fun game for all 5 players.
